title: Infect
desc: Infect one subject - human, animal or garbage bin

title: Sneeze
desc: Infected human will create an area that will infect others

title: Touch
desc: Infected subjects will infect next 3 uninfected subject they touch

title: Infect Non Human
desc: Infect subject that is not human in a circle

title: Explode Bin
desc: infect an area around an infected garbage bin

title: Explode Human
desc: infect an area around an infected human

title: Explode Animal
desc: infect an area around an infected animal

title: Summon Mushroom
desc: Fully heal one subject and summon mushroom to infect others

title: Teleport
desc: teleport a random infected subject to a position

title: Attract
desc: animals in an area would attract not infected human

title: Push Away
desc: everything in an area would try to leave this area

title: Infect Bin
desc: Infect garbage bins in a circle
